-= Info about application 'Bridge' =-
[Synopsis] Bridge two channels
[Description] Usage: Bridge(channel[,options]) Allows the ability to bridge two channels via the dialplan. The current channel is bridged to the specified 'channel'. Options: p - Play a courtesy tone to 'channel'. This application sets the following channel variable upon completion: BRIDGERESULT The result of the bridge attempt as a text string, one of SUCCESS | FAILURE | LOOP | NONEXISTENT | INCOMPATIBLE
